sentences.sentence: We have got control problem, yaw damper inoperative.
sentences.translation: 我们操作系统故障，偏航阻尼器不工作了。

sentences.sentence: This can result in other dependent database objects or packages becoming invalid (or inoperative).
sentences.translation: 这将导致其他有依赖关系的数据库对象或包失效(或者不起作用)。

sentences.sentence: Your computer is down, your PDA discharged, and all of your common organization tools are inoperative.
sentences.translation: 你的电脑不能工作，掌上电脑也没电了，所有的常用组织工具也都不能用了。你会怎么办？
